revised_title: Experimental Investigation of the Resistance of Flexure in Beams
tldr: The author conducts experiments on various beam forms to investigate the resistance of flexure, a previously overlooked element of strength in beams subjected to transverse strain. The results show that flexural resistance is evenly distributed over the surface and is due to lateral cohesion between adjacent surfaces of fibers or particles. The author also determines the relationship between straining and resisting forces in different beam sections.
